properties.name: Takab County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Takab County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 115

Location: Iran

Takab County, or Tekab County (Persian: شهرستان تکاب) is located in West Azerbaijan province, Iran. The capital of the county is Takab.

Sungun Mine (Songun Mine), Varzaqan county, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Porphyry copper deposit with minor skarns developed in the rim zone of the intrusive stock. The largest open-cast copper mine in Iran. Porphyry copper Oligocene- Miocene 850 Mt, 0.62% Cu, 0.01% Mo

properties.name: Chah-Gaz iron oxide-apatite ore deposit, Rabatat Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Chah-Gaz iron oxide-apatite ore deposit, Rabatat Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 281

Location: Iran

Shale-hosted Pb-Zn mineralisation. The Chah-Gaz magmatic complex occupies an area of ∼ 5 km². It consists of rhyolite/rhyodacite of the CVSU, and granite and alkaline gabbro-diorite that occur as elongated bodies bounded by NW–SE faults.[[1]]
